attributes.action: Intervene to stop National rail being outsourced to Mumbai
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 180 British jobs will be lost when National rail outsouces all calls to Mumbai, India. This Short-termist policy will put 180 people out of their preferred job, likely cost the UK tax payer more in benefits than savings to National rail and reduce the quality of service to users.
